00002 /*! _zgbmatrix+zhematrix operator */
00003 inline _zgematrix operator+(const _zgbmatrix& matA, const zhematrix& matB)
00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00006   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator+(const _zgbmatrix&, const zhematrix&)"
00007             << std::endl;
00008 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00009   
00010 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00011   if(matA.M!=matB.N || matA.N!=matB.N){
00012     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(_zgbmatrix&, zhematrix&)" << std::endl
00013               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00014               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00015               << matB.N << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00016     exit(1);
00017   }
00018 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00019   
00020   zgematrix newmat(matB);
00021   for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00022     for(long j=max(0,i-matA.KL); j<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); j++){
00023       newmat(i,j)+=matA(i,j);
00024     }
00025   }
00026   
00027   matA.destroy();
00028   return _(newmat);
00029 }

00033 inline _zgematrix operator-(const _zgbmatrix& matA, const zhematrix& matB)
00034 {
00035 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00036   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator-(const _zgbmatrix&, const zhematrix&)"
00037             << std::endl;
00038 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00039   
00040 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00041   if(matA.M!=matB.N || matA.N!=matB.N){
00042     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(_zgbmatrix&, zhematrix&)" << std::endl
00043               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00044               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00045               << matB.N << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00046     exit(1);
00047   }
00048 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00049   
00050   zgematrix newmat(-matB);
00051   for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00052     for(long j=max(0,i-matA.KL); j<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); j++){
00053       newmat(i,j)+=matA(i,j);
00054     }
00055   }
00056   
00057   matA.destroy();
00058   return _(newmat);
00059 }

00062 /*! _zgbmatrix*zgematrix operator */
00063 inline _zgematrix operator*(const _zgbmatrix& matA, const zhematrix& matB)
00064 {
00065 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00066   std::cerr << "# [MARK] operator*(const _zgbmatrix&, const zhematrix&)"
00067             << std::endl;
00068 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00069   
00070 #ifdef  CPPL_DEBUG
00071   if(matA.N!=matB.N){
00072     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator*(zgbmatrix&, zhematrix&)" << std::endl
00073               << "These two matrises can not make a product." << std::endl
00074               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") * ("
00075               << matB.N << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00076     exit(1);
00077   }
00078 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00079   
00080   zgematrix newmat( matA.M, matB.N );
00081   newmat.zero();
00082 
00083   long i, j, k;
00084 #pragma omp parallel for private(j,k)  
00085   for(i=0; i<newmat.m; i++){
00086     for(j=0; j<newmat.n; j++){
00087       for(k=max(0,i-matA.KL); k<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); k++){
00088         newmat(i,j)+=matA(i,k)*matB(k,j);
00089       }
00090     }
00091   }
00092   
00093   matA.destroy();
00094   return _(newmat);
00095 }
